type ApplicationEvents4_MailMergeBeforeRecordMergeEventHandler = delegate of Document * bool -> unit

param.name: Cancel
param.span: 如果为 True，则仅在当前记录的邮件合并过程开始前停止该过程。

span.span: True stops the mail merge process for the current record only before it starts.

summary.span: 用于为事件添加事件处理程序的委托类型 。

span.span: A Delegate type used to add an event handler for the event.

summary.span: 在对合并中的单个记录执行合并时，将发生MailMergeBeforeRecordMerge事件。

span.span: The MailMergeBeforeRecordMerge event occurs as a merge is executed for the individual records in a merge.
